definition: to slip away/to escape in stealth/to skate
ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: The best of America's skaters beamed for the camera.
sentences.chinese: 最佳美國的溜冰者爲照相機放光了。

sentences.english: The skaters glided gracefully over the ice.
sentences.chinese: 溜冰者們在冰面上優美地滑行。

sentences.english: I am as awkward as a cow on skates.
sentences.chinese: 我笨得像一頭穿着溜冰鞋的牛。

sentences.english: By the 16th century, skaters were transporting goods across frozen waterways.
sentences.chinese: 16世紀的溜冰者是在冰凍的水面上運送貨物。

sentences.english: She skated a perfect figure of eight.
sentences.chinese: 她的8字花式溜冰動作堪稱完美。

sentences.english: There is a big skating ground near our school.
sentences.chinese: 我們學校附近有一個大型溜冰場。

sentences.english: In the winter we ski and skate.
they have ice skating there in the winter as well.
sentences.chinese: 冬天也可以在那兒溜冰。

sentences.english: When did you start skating? And how did you discover slalom-skating?
sentences.chinese: 你何時開始溜冰的，又如何發現平花？。

sentences.english: You can rent roller skates at the skating arena .
sentences.chinese: 在溜冰場你能夠租到溜冰鞋。

sentences.english: You can rent roller skates at the skating arena .
sentences.chinese: 在溜冰場你能夠租到溜冰鞋。

sentences.english: Teenagers can go roller blading or ice skating.
sentences.chinese: 年輕人可以去玩滾軸或者是溜冰。

sentences.english: Join this club, and you will like to roller-skate.
sentences.chinese: 加入這個社團，你會愛上溜冰。

sentences.english: I'm you the Hilltop School Skating Marathon.
sentences.chinese: 我是在高山學校溜冰馬拉松賽的現場向您報道。

sentences.english: This is a good place for roller-skating .
sentences.chinese: 這是做輪式溜冰的好地方。

definition: skating or ice rink/ice stadium/ice arena
